Tips: Major hallways should be 2-3 tiles wide for optimal pathing.
Meeting Halls, Taverns, and other central activities should be central to the fort.
Apartments should leverage Z-levels for efficiency.
Segregating your fortress by production material can boost efficiency.
Spherical forts are optimized to take advantage of dwarven pathing.
Blocks are lighter and therefore more efficient for dwarves to build with than blocks.
Slowly growing your fortress wealth and population can lead to a healthier fort.
Remember: Were-beasts come as visitors to taverns. Open them to foreigners at your own risk.
